items.sentence: Tom plays the guitar, sings and writes songs.
Tom poured Mary a drink and handed it to her.
I hope you won\'t expect results immediately.
I chose not to do that the way Tom suggested.
I could probably convince Tom not to do that.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t likely to do that.
Why are those people climbing up on the roof?
Why are you doing your homework at this time?
Why are you drinking at this time of the day?
Why are you thinking about quitting your job?
I wonder how long Tom has been sitting there.
I wondered why Tom gave his speech in French.
Will your father eat dinner with you tonight?
Why did you tell Tom that you don\'t know me?
Tom knew what Mary had told him wasn\'t true.
Don\'t risk your neck over something foolish.
Don\'t tell Tom what we plan to do next week.
I google everyone that I interview for a job.
I got to Australia three days before Tom did.
Do you think it had something to do with Tom?
Can you think of a better idea than this one?
Can you verify that this message is from Tom?
Could Tom really be as busy as he says he is?
Could we stay at your place for a few nights?
Did it not occur to you to close the windows?
Did you buy everything we need for our party?
Tom took off his leather jacket and sat down.
I thought Tom would walk you to the elevator.
I told Tom that it was OK for him to do that.
Tom won\'t go away if you don\'t want him to.
Give me the knife and let me slice the bread.
Has anyone in your family ever been arrested?
Have I ever told about how I met your mother?
Tom hasn\'t yet done what we asked him to do.
I think Tom would probably disagree with you.
I won\'t believe it until I hear it from Tom.
I wonder why Tom wouldn\'t cooperate with us.
I\'ve already told Tom where to park his car.
Tom visits Mary every time he goes to Boston.
Tom was immediately questioned by the police.
A million thoughts raced through Tom\'s mind.
We\'d save time if we drove down Park Street.
We\'ll try to answer the following questions.
I know you\'re hiding somewhere in this room.
You\'re just afraid you\'ll have to kiss Tom.
Tom tried to convince Mary that he was right.

Tom tried to get Mary to accept our proposal.

I didn\'t know Tom didn\'t understand French.
